tool_description: Compares current review and sales performance metrics against historical performance, industry benchmarks, and competitor data.
error_messages: Invalid rating values: Ratings must be between 1 and 5.
Invalid conversion rates: Conversion rates must be between 0 and 100.
Negative review volume: Review volume must be a non-negative integer.
Unknown industry category: Provided category not recognized for benchmarking.
usage: Provide current metrics (rating, review_volume, conversion_rate). Optionally include historical values and industry_category for comprehensive benchmarking.

rating_performance.description: Performance assessment: above_benchmark, at_benchmark, or below_benchmark

volume_performance.description: Review volume performance compared to benchmarks
